name: UITextField.BorderStyle
desc: The type of border around the text field.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The text field does not display a border.

items.name: case line
items.desc: Displays a thin rectangle around the text field.

items.name: case bezel
items.desc: Displays a bezel-style border for the text field. This style is typically used for standard data-entry fields.

items.name: case roundedRect
items.desc: Displays a rounded-style border for the text field.
